=`LAST`=

{{{
LAST(expression)
}}}

Returns the last value in a group.

===Examples===

{{{
SELECT deptID, LAST(Name) FROM Employees GROUP BY deptID;
}}}

{{{
SELECT blue, LAST(red) FROM colors GROUP BY blue;
}}}
